content: I already joined a book club that focuses on reading and discussing books by authors of color. We just had our first meeting last month where we discussed "The Poppy War" by R.F. Kuang. I'm really looking forward to our next meeting on April 1st, where we'll be discussing "The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao" by Junot Díaz. Do you know any other book clubs that focus on diverse authors or genres?
